name: Ur Escape
description:
In the middle of a chase, you accidentally activated a trap. You feel down, and you see yourself inside a maze. How quick will you get out?

Control:
WASD to move
Left-click to Attack
Right-click to Open Map

The longer you stay in the maze, the harder you will to get a way out.

Credits:
Roger Gilbert Fernandi - Game Designer
Ferry - 2D Artist
Wilson Nathaniel - Game Designer & Programmer
Kensi - Game Designer
Winson Allan Wijaya - Sound Engineer
